resources.string: By sending in stack traces you are helping the ongoing development of Astron\nWarning: This will use your XMPP account to send the stack trace to the developer.

Astron utilizes a third party app called OpenKeychain to encrypt and decrypt messages and to manage your public keys.

OpenKeychain is licensed under GPLv3 and available on F-Droid and Google Play.

(Please restart Astron afterwards.)
Astron is unable to encrypt your messages because your contactPhone is not announcing his or hers public key.\n\nPlease ask your contactPhone to setup OpenPGP.
Astron is unable to encrypt your messages because your contacts are not announcing their public key.\n\nPlease ask your contacts to setup OpenPGP.
The length of time Astron keeps quiet after seeing activity on another device
By sending in stack traces you are helping the ongoing development of Astron
Astron needs access to external storage
Astron needs access to the camera
Your device is doing some heavy battery optimizations on Astron that might lead to delayed notifications or even message loss.\nIt is recommended to disable those.
Your device is doing some heavy battery optimizations on Astron that might lead to delayed notifications or even message loss.\n\nYou will now be asked to disable those.
Let all your contacts know when you use Astron

Your operating system is restricting Astron from accessing the Internet when in background. To receive notifications of new messages you should allow Astron unrestricted access when Data saver is on.\nAstron will still make an effort to save data when possible.
Your device does not support disabling Data saver for Astron.
To keep receiving notifications, even when the screen is turned off, you need to add Astron to the list of protected apps.
Astron is unable to send encrypted messages to %1$s. This may be due to your contactPhone using an outdated server or client that can not handle Secure.
Astron needs access to the microphone
This notification category is used to display a permanent notification indicating that Astron is running.
